item.title: Vectra add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Vectra add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Good books don't give up all their secrets at once." -- Stephen King

item.title: Vectra add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Go then, there are other worlds than these." -- Stephen King

item.title: Vectra add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The road to hell is paved with adverbs." -- Stephen King

item.title: Vectra add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "Your memory is a monster; you forget—it doesn't. It simply files things away. It keeps things for you, or hides things from you—and summons them to your recall with will of its own. You think you have a memory; but it has you!" -- John Irving

item.title: Vectra add a quote by Stephen King
item.description:
"I do not aim with my hand; he who aims with his hand has forgotten the face of his father. I aim with my eye.
I do not shoot with my hand; he who shoots with his hand has forgotten the face of his father. I shoot with my mind.
I do not kill with my gun; he who kills with his gun has forgotten the face of his father. I kill with my heart." -- Stephen King

item.title: Vectra add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "We all float down here!" -- Stephen King

item.title: Vectra add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "First comes smiles, then lies. Last is gunfire.-Roland Deschain, of Gilead" -- Stephen King
